text: @JoeBiden Whine whine whine poor little orange billionaire locked up in WH luxury, safe with family, covid19-testing his contacts, professionally protected from gun violence, personal physician on call, chef, gardener & a privileged job....he’s got it SO tough. It’s just indecent. @JoeNBC
